it.polimi.se2019.view

Interface ViewInterface

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    CLIView, GUIView, RemoteView, VirtualView, VirtualViewDriver, VirtualViewDriverAsync, VirtualViewDriverSync

    public interface ViewInterface
    Interface of the View class. It has the methods to ask the user a question and to record the answer. It also contains the methods to update the Representations of the main elements of the game.
    Author:
    Marchingegno

    • Method Detail

      • getNickname

        java.lang.String getNickname()

      • askAction

        void askAction(boolean activablePowerups,
               boolean activableWeapons)
        Ask the user an action to perform.
        Parameters:
        activablePowerups - must be true if the player has an activable powerup in his inventory.
        activableWeapons - must be true if the player has a loaded weapon in his inventory.

      • askGrabWeapon

        void askGrabWeapon(java.util.List<java.lang.Integer> indexesOfTheGrabbableWeapons)
        Asks the user which weapon to grab.
        Parameters:
        indexesOfTheGrabbableWeapons - the weapons that the player can grab.

      • askSwapWeapon

        void askSwapWeapon(java.util.List<java.lang.Integer> indexesOfTheGrabbableWeapons)
        If the player has already 3 weapons and tries to grab another one, this asks which weapon the user would like to leave behind.
        Parameters:
        indexesOfTheGrabbableWeapons - the weapons that the player can grab.

      • askMove

        void askMove(java.util.List<Coordinates> reachableCoordinates)
        Asks the user where would he like to move.
        Parameters:
        reachableCoordinates - the list of coordinates available to choose from.

      • askShoot

        void askShoot(java.util.List<java.lang.Integer> shootableWeapons)
        Asks the user which weapon to shoot with.
        Parameters:
        shootableWeapons - the weapons the player can shoot with.

        Parameters:
        loadableWeapons - the weapons to choose from.

      • askSpawn

        void askSpawn()
        Asks the user to discard a powerup card in order to spawn.

      • askWeaponChoice

        void askWeaponChoice(QuestionContainer questionContainer)
        Asks the user a Question Container from the weapon he is shooting with, to advance the shooting process.
        Parameters:
        questionContainer - the Question Container from the weapon.

      • askPowerupActivation

        void askPowerupActivation(java.util.List<java.lang.Integer> activablePowerups)
        Asks the user which powerup to activate.
        Parameters:
        activablePowerups - the list of powerup to choose from.

      • askOnDamagePowerupActivation

        void askOnDamagePowerupActivation(java.util.List<java.lang.Integer> activablePowerups,
                                  java.lang.String shootingPlayer)
        Asks if the user would like to activate an on-damage powerup, such as Tagback Grenade.
        Parameters:
        activablePowerups - the list of powerup to choose from.
        shootingPlayer - the enemy that hit the player.

      • askPowerupChoice

        void askPowerupChoice(QuestionContainer questionContainer)
        Asks the user a Question Container from the powerup he is activating.
        Parameters:
        questionContainer - the Question Container from the powerup.

      • askEnd

        void askEnd(boolean activablePowerups)
        Asks the user the end game question.
        Parameters:
        activablePowerups - the list of powerup he can use.

      • askToPay

        void askToPay(java.util.List<AmmoType> priceToPay,
              boolean canAffordAlsoWithAmmo)
        Asks the user to pay for an action he is executing.
        Parameters:
        priceToPay - the price that the user will pay.
        canAffordAlsoWithAmmo - whether the user can use only ammos to pay the price.
